details.title: Monopulse Antenna Performance When Receiving Nonuniform Waves
details.abstract: Variations in apparent target direction, or glint, as sensed by an amplitude monopulse tracking antenna are analyzed for several cases when a nonuniform wave is incident on the antenna. Results are given for a target consisting of two isotropic scatterers, and compared with results previously obtained for the case of a locally uniform wave incident on the antenna.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
